subject: IBM T22 S3 Savage Video Sarge to Etch Upgrade
body:
I ran Synaptic upgrade from Sarge to Etch without bothering to read the upgrade 
docs first:-( 
Synaptic completed ok, just the usual questions about  
what to keep and what to replace. Noted that menu fonts in firefox were changed.
I rebooted and now have just a command line. GUI tries to start, but fails.

Any help would be much appreciated.

John
Sys. Admn.
On-Site Services.


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
